root: ^Good job Joe on exploring planet Ara. You found the shield generator which has now given you shields all around your ship to stop any danger happening.
^We do this to all our crewmates to make sure everyone is safe.

c-0: ^Our next mission for you Joe is to explore 2 more planets through the asteroids. The planets are located beyond the hyperdrive. Make sure you stay alert as these planets have not been researched yet.
